title: Bali in 8k ULTRA HD HDR -  Paradise of Asia (60 FPS)
description:
This 8K HDR video contains over 45 clips showcasing nature, places, rivers, and wildlife, perfect for learning and entertainment. It's optimized for 8K TVs and can be enjoyed in various settings like homes, offices, and hotels.

0:00 Starting with the majestic Sekumpul waterfalls
0:05 Followed by the luxurious Handara Golf & Resort
0:08 The lush green fields of Bali
0:12 The serene Nunggalan beach
0:15 The iconic Pura Ulun Danu Bratan temple
0:19 Vast rice fields of Subak in Bali
0:22 A couple on a motorcycle exploring the tropical roads
0:31 The breathtaking waterfalls amidst the green tropical forest
0:42 The stunning Handara Golf & Resort in Bali
0:58 The magnificent Ulun Danu Beratan temple
1:08 The picturesque rice fields of Bali
1:23 Various waterfalls cascading down the cliffs
1:31 The grandeur of the Ubud Palace in Bali
1:38 Majestic elephant statues in a park
1:44 The enchanting Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary in Indonesia
1:55 The striking beauty of Sekumpul waterfalls in Bali
2:04 Gorgeous green rice fields of Bali
2:13 The majestic Ubud Palace in Bali, Indonesia
2:24 The enchanting waterfalls cascading down the cliffs
2:34 The beautiful sea beach of Bali
2:38 The sea water entering a hole in the ground from a trench
2:46 The mesmerizing sunset on the beach
3:00 The pristine Kelingking sea beach with crystal-clear water
3:09 A hardworking rice farmer in Ubud, Bali
3:16 The grand entrance gate of Handara Golf & Resort in Bali
3:22 A majestic tiger in slow motion at the Bali Zoo
3:26 The stunning aerial view of Kelingking beach
3:31 The spiral road amidst the lush green forest in Indonesia
3:39 The breathtaking beauty of the rice terraces in Bali
3:46 A close-up view of a graceful deer at the Bali Zoo
3:52 The mesmerizing coastline of Nunggalan Beach in Uluwatu, Bali
3:57 The majestic statues of a temple in Bali
4:05 The captivating sunset at Jatiluwih rice field in Bali, Indonesia
4:12 The enchanting Munduk waterfall in North Bali
4:23 The tropical waterfall is hidden in the lush jungle
4:33 The magnificent green rice fields amidst the mountains
4:39 The stunning aerial view of the Bali beach and blue water
4:49 The ocean waves roll onto the sandy Atuh beach
4:59 A close-up view of the mesmerizing Nungnung waterfall
5:05 The stunning waterfall and lush forest in Bali, Indonesia
5:12 The iconic Pura Ulun Danu Bratan temple in Bali, Indonesia
5:20 The aesthetic beauty of the waterfalls in Bali
5:29 Visitors admiring the grandeur of the Ubud Palace in Bali
5:34 A group of wonderful girls looking at the camera
5:40 End credits


Music Credits:
-------------------------------
"Sanctum"  by Scott Buckley was released under CC-BY 4.0.
www.scottbuckley.com.au
Music link - https://youtu.be/BGYhc2zZj6g
Youtube Channel link - https://www.youtube.com/@ScottBuckley
-------------------------
Credit thumbnail- Shutterstock
---------------------------------
Credit for the footage used in this video goes to YouTube, Artgrid, Provideofactory, and Storyblocks.

Note: If you want to view in 8k resolution, you need Chrome or a better browser.

Copyright disclaimer: All video and audio footage is under standard license. 
I color-corrected and edited all of the footage; the video footage is also Copyrighted Under a Standard License.

CONTACT US:
✉ email: durbar0321@gmail.com
